attributes.action: Make Haringey Council return the children to Florin Barbu
attributes.background:
https://twitter.com/steven_woolfe/status/701879455510347780

The children of Florin Barbu are being forcibly adopted without consideration that these kids are Romanian citizens!

rejection.details:
This is appears to be a matter that Haringey Council are responsible for. This Council has their own petitions site that you may want to use to raise this issue. 

http://www.haringey.gov.uk/local-democracy/meetings/petitions
